description: Somerset sign all-rounder Danny Lamb on loan from Lancashire for their One-Day Cup group matches.
title: Danny Lamb: Somerset sign Lancashire all-rounder for One-Day Cup
title_page: Danny Lamb: Somerset sign Lancashire all-rounder for One-Day Cup - BBC Sport
maintext:
Somerset have signed all-rounder Danny Lamb on loan from Lancashire for their One-Day Cup group matches.
The 27-year-old has made 18 50-over appearances for Lancashire since his debut in 2017, taking 28 wickets and scoring almost 300 runs.
Lamb was in the Lancashire side that made the One-Day Cup final last season.
